verses.verse: [b]A song of ascents. When the LORD brought home the captives to Zion, we seemed to be dreaming.[c]
Our mouths were filled with laughter and our tongues with songs of joy. Then it was said among the nations, “The LORD has done great things for them.”[d]
The LORD has indeed done great deeds for us, and we are overflowing with joy.[e]
[f]Once again restore our fortunes,[g] O LORD, as you did for the streams in the Negeb.
Those who sow in tears[h] will reap with songs of joy.
Those who go forth weeping, carrying the seeds to be sown,[i] will return with shouts of joy, carrying their sheaves.
